item.title: November home sales surged more than expected, boosted by lower mortgage rates
item.description: Sales of previously owned homes rose 4.8% in November compared with October, according to the National Association of Realtors

item.title: FDA says Eli Lilly's weight loss drug Zepbound is no longer in shortage
item.description: The decision that will eventually bar compounding pharmacies from making unbranded versions of the injection.

item.title: The Fed's rate outlook has rattled markets. Here's what it means for global central banks

item.title: Wall Street's fear gauge — the VIX — saw second-biggest spike ever on Wednesday
item.description: The CBOE Volatility Index (.VIX) surged 74% to close at 27.62, up from around 15 earlier in the day.
